```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
set.seed(10)

iris_with_missing = iris %>% 
  map_df(~replace(.x, sample(1:150, 20), NA)) %>%
  mutate(Species = as.character(Species))

iris = janitor::clean_names(iris_with_missing)
```

# problem 1
```{r}
iris %>%
  mutate(is.na(sepal_length), mean(sepal_length),
         is.na(sepal_width), mean(sepal_width))
```
